attributes.action: Letting parents know and have a say before releasing peadophiles in to their area.
attributes.additional_details:
Peadophiles seem to have more human rights than our children after serving time for abuse.
As parents we want the right to know if a Peadophile is going to be released in to our area and then we shold have a say to if we want them there or not, near our schools and children. We have the right to know if a peadophile is living near us as well as in the street name that they live.
